He hails from McComb, Miss., a town with the curious distinction of being home turf for both Bo Diddley and Britney Spears. ItÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s well established that Omar started playing guitar at seven, took to hanging out in edge-of-town juke joints at 12, joined his first band at 13 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ the next youngest player being 50 ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ and played the sort of music where somebody bustinÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ a cap at somebody else was just added percussion.
